name: .EVP File Extension
summary: Learn about .EVP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Game data file referenced by Talisman Online, a free 3D fantasy MMORPG game; contains data, such as server, game sounds, and login information, referenced by the game.

content: The EVP file can be found in the same folder as the game .EXE file. There will be two EVP files in the folder titled "data.evp" and "ucfile.evp."

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
